foreignData.name: Blutige Ausbeute
foreignData.text: Bringe einen X/X schwarzen Schrecken-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Kreaturen ist, die in diesem Zug gestorben sind.

foreignData.name: Botín de sangre
foreignData.text: Pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Horror negra X/X, donde X es la cantidad de criaturas que murieron este turno.

foreignData.flavorText: « Il y a toujours des restes. » —Derecht, tailleur de chair
foreignData.name: Butin de sang
foreignData.text: Mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature X/X noire Horreur, X étant le nombre de créatures qui sont mortes ce tour-ci.

foreignData.flavorText: "Restano sempre degli avanzi." —Derecht, intagliatore di carne
foreignData.name: Spoglie di Sangue
foreignData.text: Metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Orrore X/X nera, dove X è il numero di creature che sono morte in questo turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 「余りものならいつでもある。」 ――肉裂き魔、デレクト
foreignData.name: 血の戦利品
foreignData.text: 黒のＸ/Ｘのホラー・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。Ｘはこのターンに死亡したクリーチャーの総数に等しい。

foreignData.flavorText: 「总是有剩下的东西。」 ～命雕师德雷切
foreignData.name: 集血化生
foreignData.text: 将一个X/X黑色惊惧兽衍生生物放进战场，X为于本回合中死去的生物数量。

name: Spoils of Blood
originalText: Put an X/X black Horror creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the number of creatures that died this turn.

rulings.text: Use the number of creatures that died that turn as Spoils of Blood resolves to determine the value of X. In other words, creatures that die in response to Spoils of Blood will count.

text: Create an X/X black Horror creature token, where X is the number of creatures that died this turn.
